title: Understanding the Sample Mean
text: The mean number of days absent calculated from the instructor's sample is a specific value derived from a subset of a larger population. What is this an example of?

title: Distinguishing Between Statistic and Parameter
text: A statistic is a measure that describes a characteristic of a sample, while a parameter describes a characteristic of a population. Which one does the mean number of days absent represent?

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: The mean number of days absent, calculated from the instructor's sample, is an example of which of the following?
